Name: alpha thalassemia-intellectual disability syndrome type 1
Definition: An alpha thalassemia that has_material_basis_in a deletion in chromosome 16p that involves the alpha-1 (HBA1) and alpha-2 (HBA2) genes

Name: alpha thalassemia-X-linked intellectual disability syndrome
Definition: An alpha thalassemia that has_material_basis_in mutation in the ATRX gene on Xq21.

Name: hemoglobin H disease
Definition: An alpha thalassemia that has_material_basis_in contiguous gene deletion of the hemoglobin alpha-1 (HBA1) and alpha-2 (HBA2) genes on one chromosome 16
